title: Smash Bros. Director Teases Next Game - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.22.24
description:
New World: Aeternum is OUT NOW on PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S! https://bit.ly/3XROcCT 

Phasmophobia releases on PS5, PS VR2, and Xbox Series X|S on October 29. Wishlist now!
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10005673
Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/phasmophobia-game-preview/9N6D60SBZN05/0010

Download the Marvel Snap app now available on the App Store, Google Play and Steam, or visit http://www.marvelsnap.com to learn more.

Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KINDAFUNNY for 50% OFF 2 or more pairs of shades. 

We’re here to talk about video game news!

Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
 - GAMESCAST - Arkham Shadow Review (So Far)
 - The STREAM after is Blumhouse’s new horror game Fear the Spotlight and interviewing the devs!
If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
 - You can get today’s Gregway

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:19 - Housekeeping
               -  The Roper Report   -
00:05:55 - Smash Bros. Creator Masahiro Sakurai Quits YouTube With Final Video Teasing Mystery New Game
00:19:49 - Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown Team Disbanded At Ubisoft, It’s Claimed
00:37:32 - The Wolf Among Us 2 not canceled, Telltale confirms
00:40:12 - Netflix Shuts Down ‘AAA’ Gaming Studio
00:49:23 - Alan Wake 2 on PS5 Pro Details
00:56:01 - Microsoft has a new Wireless Headset
01:00:22 - Wee News!
01:02:47 - You‘re Wrong & SuperChats
